Blanca is requesting a loan to buy supplies (corn, firewood, and gas) so that she will have enough inventory to meet the demands of her customers. She plans to buy in large quantities so that she can obtain better prices.

Her dream is to open a pupusa shop, provide her children with the education they need to succeed, and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: Purchase corn, firewood, and gas

loans.name: Amah

texts.fr: K. est une femme de 35 ans, elle est très dynamique et subvient à ses charges grâce aux commerces qu'elle exerce et qui est la vente de produits d'alimentation générale. elle fait son commerce au marché de hedzranawoé et s'approvisionne aux marché local d'adawlato. elle a une ancienneté de  3 ans dans ce commerce. elle a constaté une baisse de son stock de marchandises. ayant déjà obtenu de WAGES 2 crédits qu'elle a bien remboursé, elle sollicite de WAGES un 3ème crédit pour l'achat de 10 sacs de sucres, 10 sacs de blé, 5 cartons de rexona, 2 cartons d'arôme, 2 sacs de bissap.
texts.en:
Amah K. is 35 years old. She is very energetic and supports herself thanks to the business that she runs selling general food products. She operates her busines at the Hedzranawoé market and gets her supplies at the Adawlato local market. She has 3 years of experience in this business and has noticed that her stock of merchandise is running low. Having already obtained 2 loans from WAGES that she fully repaid, she is asking for a 3rd loan from WAGES to buy 10 bags of sugar, 10 sacks of wheat, 5 boxes of deodorant, 2 boxes of flavoring and 2 bags of bissap (hibiscus flowers).

Translated from French by Connie Archea, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy general food products

loans.name: Ciro

texts.es: Ciro tiene 47 años, es un padre de familia muy abnegado, vive en su casa propia, junto a su esposa y sus 5 hijos. La gran responsabilidad que tiene Ciro, lo ha llevado a tener dos trabajos, durante las noches trabaja como vigilante en una fábrica textil y por el día ofrece el servicio de transporte público. Para él es muy importante que sus hijos terminen de estudiar en el colegio para que luego se formen una profesión y por ello debe trabajar duro y parejo. Es amante del trabajo, por ello, sus vecinos lo buscan para cualquier servicio que requieran, de ese modo multiplica más sus ingresos, ya que por lo pronto desea construir su casa, en donde pueda acondicionar varias habitaciones para poder alquilarlos. Este es su cuarto crédito con MFV, y se compromete en seguir pagando cada una de sus cuotas puntualmente, puesto que desea contar con nuevos préstamos mas adelante. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará fierros, cementos y demás materiales de construcción, para techar una parte de su casa.
texts.en:
Ciro is 47 years old and a dedicated father. He lives in his own home with his wife and five children. Ciro has a great amount of responsibility since he holds down two jobs. At night he works as a security guard at a textile factory and then he provides public transportation services during the day. Ciro believes it is important for his children to finish high school so that they can later pursue a profession. This drives him to work hard and put in long hours. Ciro enjoys working, so his neighbors look to him to provide any services that they need to have performed so that he can earn some extra income. He wants to build a house and plans to equip several of the rooms so that they can be made available for rent.

Ciro is taking his fourth loan with MFP. He promises to continue submitting each of his payments on time so that he can be eligible for subsequent loans. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy iron bars, cement, and other construction materials so that he can install a roof over part of his house.

loans.use: Purchase materials needed to put a roof over part of his house

loans.name: Pancha Laxmi

texts.en:
This is 41-year-old Pancha Laxmi S.. She is married and has 4 children, aged 25, 22, 21 and 19. In 2005, she established her incense-making business. She supports her family by working7 hours a day, 7 days a week. She wants to use this loan from Patan BPW to increase inventory for incense-making. In the future, Pancha Laxmi plans to expand the business. She thanks you for your support. 

This loan was administered by Kiva's local partner MFI, Patan Business and Professional Women. Patan BPW became Kiva's first field partner in Nepal in 2007. Patan BPW operates throughout the Kathmandu Valley, offering micro-credit and business training programs to low-income women. In addition to providing economic opportunity to their clients, Patan BPW seeks to empower Nepali women within the home and community. For more information about Patan BPW, visit our partner page and keep an eye out for new loans and borrower updates: BPW Partner Page. Join our lending team: BPW Lending Team.

loans.use: To buy material for manufacturing incense

loans.name: Maguette

texts.fr: Madame Maguette G.  est une femme mariée de 39 ans qui habite dans la localité de Bambilor. Elle a très tôt abandonnée  l’école pour s’adonner au petit commerce. Elle achète et vend des denrées de toutes sortes (cubes de bouillon, huile de palme tomate…) depuis  déjà plus de 15 ans. Elle est membre de la caisse de Bambilor depuis  juin 2010.Elle  n’a pas encore bénéficié de  prêt au sein de l’institution. Elle sollicite un prêt de  200 000f  qui sera  destiné  au renforcement de son fonds de roulement. Le prêt lui permettra de fructifier ses revenus et par conséquent de participer au mieux a la dépense quotidienne.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maguette G. is a 39-year-old married woman who lives in the Bambilor area. She left school at a young age in order to work in retail sales. She has bought and sold all types of products (bouillon cubes, palm oil, tomatoes...) for more than fifteen years. She has been a member of the Bambilor branch of UIMCEC since June 2010. She has not yet received a loan from the institution. She is seeking a loan of 200,000 francs which will be used to increase her working capital. The loan will allow her to increase her income and thus pay more of the daily expenses.

Translated from French by Robin Clochard, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase working capital

loans.name: Jamuna

texts.en:
This is 24-year-old Jamuna K.C. She is married and has one child, age 2. In 2009, she established her business selling kurta (women's dresses).  She supports her family working 8 hours a day, 6 days a week. She wants to use this loans from Patan BPW to increase her inventory for selling. In the future, Jamuna plans to expand the business. She thanks you for your support. 

This loan was administered by Kiva's local partner MFI, Patan Business and Professional Women. Patan BPW became Kiva's first field partner in Nepal in 2007. Patan BPW operates throughout the Kathmandu Valley, offering micro-credit and business training programs to low-income women. In addition to providing economic opportunity to their clients, Patan BPW seeks to empower Nepali women within the home and community. For more information about Patan BPW, visit our partner page and keep an eye out for new loans and borrower updates: BPW Partner Page. Join our lending team: BPW Lending Team.

loans.use: To increase inventory of cloth and kurta (women's dresses)

loans.name: Belisario

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “Madres Trabajadoras”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Santiago, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Belisario; el tiene 27 años de edad y es soltero y tiene 1 hijo; el socio trabaja como conductor de una combi que hace servicio público, el trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m ya que la combi que trabaja no es propietario, él le gustaría comprarse un carro, el socio quiere tener un negocio de venta de repuestos. El socio solicita el préstamo para el estudio de su hijo y para la mantención de su casa.  

	
El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Belisario is a member of the Communal Bank “Madres Trabajadoras” (Working Mothers), which is located in the District of Santiago, Province and Department of Cusco.

He is 27 years old, single, and has one child. Sr. Belisario provides public transportation services as a minibus driver. He works from 5am to 6pm, but he does not own the minibus. Belisario would like to buy a car. He also has a business selling spare parts. Belisario is requesting a loan to pay for his child’s education and to maintain his house.

He is grateful to those who made his dream come true and promises to complete his payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Pay for his child's education & the maintenance of his house

loans.name: Gotitas De Amor Group

texts.es:
ALCOM: GOTITAS D. AMOR

Hilda lleva años participando en la Alcancía Comunal “GOTITAS D. AMOR”, conformado por nueve integrantes, estas personas forman parte del programa Prosperidad a raíz D.  la promoción del sistema en una zona alejada D. Huarochiri y el nombre  “Gotitas D. Amor” fue idea D. una socia inspirada en una novela.
Hilda, casada con 2 hijos, cuenta con una pequeña  bodega en donD.  comercializa abarrotes y verduras, lleva 8 años dedicada en este negocio, empezó con este negocio por iniciativa propia, la razón era que no quería dejar a sus niños solos en casa porque eran pequeños, además apoya a su esposo con los gastos y la atención D. los niños y así mejorar su calidad D. vida.  Con los ingresos que ella obtiene aporta para la alimentación diaria y el pago D. los servicios básicos. Hilda tiene como meta para el futuro construir su casa y ampliar su bodega y tener una sección D. útiles para librería.

Mientras tanto con el crédito que EDAPROSPO le accedió, lo invertirá como capital D. trabajo, para adquirir más mercaderías.
texts.en:
DROPLETS OF LOVE

For years Hilda has participated in the Communal Bank “Gotitas D. Amor” (Droplets of Love), which consists of nine members. These individuals are part of the “Prosperity” program that is being promoted in the remote area of Huarochiri. The name “Droplets of Love” was the idea of a member who was inspired by a novel.

Hilda is married and has two children. She has a small store where she sells groceries and vegetables. Hilda has managed this business for eight years and started it as a result of her own initiative because she did not want to leave her children alone at home because of their young age. In addition she planned to help her husband with the expenses, look after her children, and improve their quality of life. The income she generates helps to feed her family every day and pay for basic services. Hilda’s goals for the future are to build a house and expand her store by adding a section for selling books.

Meanwhile, with the loan she agreed to receive from EDAPROSPO, Hilda will use the funds as operating capital to acquire more merchandise.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Acquire more merchandise
